Data Scraping¶

Scraping data from page baseball.cz. Uses Selenium in combination with Firefox, or Chrome webdriver to save data locally. These can be then sent to FTP server as desired.

remote.server.scrape_data.cleanup_dir()[source]¶

Removes all data in save directory defined in constants.

remote.server.scrape_data.download_all()[source]¶

Downloads all individual and team statistics and saves them to the save directory defined in constants.

remote.server.scrape_data.download_single_stats()[source]¶

Downloads all individual statistics and saves them to the save director defined in constants.

remote.server.scrape_data.download_stats(category='palka', team_stats=False, browser='firefox')[source]¶

Locally saves statistics csv from baseball.cz based on the given category. File is stored in save directory defined in constants <contants.html>_ script. Default values are for individual batter, using Firefox.

Parameters:
  • category –

    Category of the statistics. Categories are defined in constants.

  • team_stats – (bool) Whether the team or individual stats should be downloaded.
  • browser – ‘firefox’ to use Firefox webdriver, otherwise Chrome webdriver will be used.
remote.server.scrape_data.download_team_stats()[source]¶

Downloads all team statistics and saves them to the save directory defined in constants.

remote.server.scrape_data.get_saveDir()[source]¶

Return save directory defined in constants. :returns: String containing path to save directory.

remote.server.scrape_data.send_to_ftp()[source]¶

Allows to send all files from directory ./data/ to FTP server. Due to its use on a server and security reasons, information about the FTP server are set as enviromental variables.

Enviromental variables:

  • FTP_SERVER – http to FTP host
  • FTP_PORT – number of the opened FTP port
  • FTP_NAME – login name to FTP server
  • FTP_PASSWRD – login password to FTP server
  • FTP_PATH – path on FTP server where files should be sent to
remote.server.scrape_data.setup_chrome_opt()[source]¶

Sets up options for Chrome webdriver. Based on defined constants it chooses where to save data and where Chrome binary and Chrome driver can be found. Sets following options:

  • download.default_directory: constants.saveDir
  • download.prompt_for_download: False
  • download.directory_upgrade: True
  • safebrowsing.enaled: True
Returns:Set Chrome webdriver object
remote.server.scrape_data.setup_firefox_opt()[source]¶

Sets up options for Firefox webdriver. Based on defined constants it chooses where to save data. Sets following options:

  • –headless
  • browser.download.folderList:2
  • browser.download.manager.showWhenStarting: False
  • browser.download.dir: constants.saveDir
  • browser.helperApps.neverAsk.saveToDisk: application/csv,text/csv,application/force-download
Returns:Set Firefox webdriver object
